name: Baikal
description:
In this game you're tasked with bringing Spring to Baikal and escorting a cart along the way.  In human form you can push rocks by moving against them.  In rabbit form you cannot push rocks, but you can clear snow tiles.  Levels require you to keep a button pushed down (pink butterflies guard the exit) and/or clear all the snow tiles (blue butterflies guard the exit).

WASD to move, E to swap between human and rabbit form.  The reset button in the top right resets the puzzle so you can try again if you get stuck,  The settings button lets you control the music and sound effects volumes as well as quit.

Illustrations - Alcy

Sound and Music - DrSkort

Sprites and Level Design - Abbie Delafosse

Programming - Cole Andress
